main: The Ashura Corp are the pinnacle of Demonic Strength! Those fragile monkeys won't know what hit them.
branch_1: The Daimaou's own handpicked standing army! We're keeping things in order till he comes back.
branch_2: Humans take so much pride in their wisdom, let's see how much Aziraphale's books and magics will serve him when we've battered his bones to dust.
